Description: No-code headless mode for Umbraco. Tailors the editor experience to a headless setup, e.g. by removing noise and irrelevant editor options.
Title: No-Code Headless Mode

RelatedPackages.Description: No-code tools for the Umbraco Delivery API. Allows for no-code definition of Delivery API filters and sorters, automatic CORS policies for API consumers and more.
